requirements.summary: The RFP requires complete interior and exterior painting for Metro Heights Apartment Complex. It specifies premium washable paint for interior walls, matte finish for ceilings, antibacterial paint for children's areas, waterproof paint for bathrooms, and weather-resistant paint for exterior walls with 7+ years durability. All paints must be Asian Paints brand, with specific product lines mentioned.
technical_specs: Premium washable paint for interior walls
Antibacterial/health-focused paint for children's play area
Weather-resistant paint for exterior walls with 7+ years durability
Specific brand preferences: Asian Paints Royale Aspira (interior walls), Apex Ultima (exterior walls), HealthShield (children's area), SmartCare (bathrooms)
Request for warranty details, application cost per liter, number of coats, and surface preparation requirements
quality_standards: Weather-resistant with 7+ years durability for exterior walls
Ability to withstand Mumbai monsoon conditions

line_items.item_description: Interior walls painting with premium washable paint
line_items.brand_preference: Asian Paints Royale Aspira or equivalent premium range

line_items.item_description: Ceiling area painting with matte finish paint
Children's play area painting with antibacterial/health-focused paint
Exterior walls painting with weather-resistant paint
line_items.brand_preference: Asian Paints Apex Ultima or equivalent premium range
